itemDescription: Bishop of Lancaster; British Anglican bishop

wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Seagrave Pearson (born 18 July 1951) is a British Anglican bishop, a retired Bishop of Lancaster in the Church of England Diocese of Blackburn.

response: |align="center"| 2006 ||align="center"| 2017 || Geoff Pearson || Retired 31 July 2017.Diocese of Blackburn — The Anglican Bishop of Lancaster announces his retirement  (Accessed 16 January 2017)Diocese of Blackburn — Bishop Geoff's retirement reflections (Accessed 26 July 2017)
